sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_workflow_model ( id char(32) not null, modelname varchar(64) not null, modeltext varchar(128), status tinyint not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, processcount int not null, unique(modelname), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_process ( id char(32) not null, modelid char(32) not null, title varchar(128), status tinyint not null, userid char(32), usertext varchar(32), createdate datetime not null, roleid char(32), roletext varchar(32), completedate datetime, properties text, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_delegation ( id char(32) not null, delegationsource tinyint not null, sourceid char(32) not null, status tinyint not null, createdate datetime not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, startdate datetime, completedate datetime, dstartdate datetime, dcompletedate datetime, rulehandler varchar(128), description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_activity ( id char(32) not null, processid char(32) not null, previousid char(32), tasknodeid char(32) not null, tasknodetext varchar(64) not null, tasknodetype tinyint not null, status tinyint not null, createdate datetime not null, completedate datetime, timeoutdate datetime, properties text, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_workitem ( id char(32) not null, activityid char(32) not null, status tinyint not null, roleid char(32) not null, roletext varchar(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, userid2 char(32) not null, usertext2 varchar(32), createdate datetime not null, completedate datetime, readmark bit, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_variable ( id char(32) not null, variablesource tinyint not null, sourceid char(32) not null, variablename varchar(32) not null, stringvalue varchar(128), clobvalue text, unique(variablesource, sourceid, variablename), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_variable_log ( id char(32) not null, variableid char(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, userid char(32) not null, stringvalue varchar(128), clobvalue text, primary key(id) );
